Our Metene Shower Brush features two distinct bristle types to match your skin's needs. Say goodbye to dead skin cells and hello to a glowing, refreshed complexion!

With a non-slip rubber patch, a carefully designed handle ensures a firm grip, even when your hands are soapy and wet. The added convenience of a hanging rope makes storage simple and keeps your brush within reach for your next rejuvenating scrub.

We understand that hygiene is as important as comfort. That's why the Metene Shower Brush is designed for low maintenance, with a recommendation to replace it every 3-6 months and to give it a thorough cleaning every few weeks, ensuring your brush remains as pristine as your newly polished skin.
